entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
